targets.expr: sum by(project_name) (libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"})
sum(openstack_nova_vcpus_used{hostname=~"$hypervisor.*"}) / sum(openstack_nova_vcpus_available{hostname=~"$hypervisor.*"}) * 100
sum(openstack_nova_memory_used_bytes{hostname=~"$hypervisor.*"}) / sum(openstack_nova_memory_available_bytes{hostname=~"$hypervisor.*"}) * 100
sum(openstack_nova_local_storage_used_bytes{hostname=~"$hypervisor.*"}) / sum(openstack_nova_local_storage_available_bytes{hostname=~"$hypervisor.*"}) * 100
sum(openstack_nova_vcpus_used{hostname=~"$hypervisor.*"})
sum(openstack_nova_vcpus_available{hostname=~"$hypervisor.*"})
sum(openstack_nova_memory_used_bytes{hostname=~"$hypervisor.*"}) / 1000000
sum(openstack_nova_memory_available_bytes{hostname=~"$hypervisor.*"}) / 1000000
sum(openstack_nova_local_storage_used_bytes{hostname=~"$hypervisor.*"}) / 1000000000
sum(openstack_nova_local_storage_available_bytes{hostname=~"$hypervisor.*"}) / 1000000000
rate(libvirt_domain_info_cpu_time_seconds_total[2m]) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}
libvirt_domain_info_memory_usage_bytes * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

(sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_receive_bytes_total[2m])) + sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_transmit_bytes_total[2m]))) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

(sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_receive_packets_total[2m])) + sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_transmit_packets_total[2m]))) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

(sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_receive_errors_total[2m])) + sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_transmit_errors_total[2m]))) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

(sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_receive_drops_total[2m])) + sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_transmit_drops_total[2m]))) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

(sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_block_stats_read_requests_total[2m])) + sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_block_stats_write_requests_total[2m]))) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

(sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_block_stats_read_bytes_total[2m])) + sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_block_stats_write_bytes_total[2m]))) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

panels.description: CPU time used by the domain, in seconds - rate over 1min

targets.expr: rate(libvirt_domain_info_cpu_time_seconds_total[2m]) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

panels.title: CPU Time

targets.expr: sum by(juju_unit) (libvirt_domain_info_memory_usage_bytes)
libvirt_domain_info_memory_usage_bytes * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}
libvirt_domain_info_maximum_memory_bytes * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

panels.description: Network traffic in bytes, rate over 1min, receive/transmit per instance, cumulative over all interfaces

targets.expr: sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_receive_bytes_total[2m])) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_transmit_bytes_total[2m])) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

panels.title: Instance Network Throughput

panels.description: Network traffic in packets, rate over 1min, receive/transmit per instance, cumulative over all interfaces

targets.expr: sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_receive_packets_total[2m])) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_transmit_packets_total[2m])) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

panels.title: Instance Packet Rate

panels.description: Total network throughput rates per hypervisor, rate over 1min

targets.expr: sum by(juju_unit) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_receive_bytes_total[2m]))
sum by(juju_unit) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_transmit_bytes_total[2m]))

panels.title: Cumulative Network Throughput

panels.description: Total network throughput rates per hypervisor, rate over 1min

targets.expr: sum by(juju_unit) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_receive_packets_total[2m]))
sum by(juju_unit) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_transmit_packets_total[2m]))

panels.title: Cumulative Packet Rate

panels.description: Instance errors and drops, transmit and receive. Rate over 1min

targets.expr: sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_receive_errors_total[2m])) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_transmit_errors_total[2m])) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_receive_drops_total[2m])) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_transmit_drops_total[2m])) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

panels.title: Instance Errors and Drops

panels.description: Instance block dev read request rate over 1min

targets.expr: sum by(juju_unit, domain, target_device) (rate(libvirt_domain_block_stats_read_requests_total[2m])) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

panels.title: IOPS Read

panels.description: Instance block dev write request rate over 1min

targets.expr: sum by(juju_unit, domain, target_device) (rate(libvirt_domain_block_stats_write_requests_total[2m])) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

panels.title: IOPS Write

panels.description: Instance block device read bytes rate over 1min

targets.expr: sum by(juju_unit, domain, target_device) (rate(libvirt_domain_block_stats_read_bytes_total[2m])) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

panels.title: Throughput Read

panels.description: Instance block device write bytes rate over 1min

targets.expr: sum by(juju_unit, domain, target_device) (rate(libvirt_domain_block_stats_write_bytes_total[2m])) * on(domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}
